column4: Hello. Using truecrypt I created a encrypted partition - and it's working fine. My question is when I delete something from that partition do I need to use a program such as 'shred'  or 'secure-delete' or can I just delete a file (or whatever) since it's encrypted?
when you rm a file it is not decrypted first, it is safe
OK, thanks. That's what I figured but I wanted a second opinion.
